issue.title: wideanglecamera sensor renders incorrect background color

content.raw:
@iche033 I agree that this patch will have to go to default, but it may be difficult for our users who are still using trusty and indigo to get this fix, since gazebo8 will not be supported on trusty.

We could consider a fix that is more of a hack if it's really important to backport to gazebo7
